SuperMD Be comforted in the knowledge that someone’s got your back Be comforted that you’ll always know your loved ones are alright Always one step ahead in caring for your loved ones GET STARTED PATIENT CAREGIVER
Hold on, we are working on your therapies Successfully Synced Therapies Unsupported Therapy This therapy type is not yet supported in current version. Okay Refresh failed! All the therapies which were added by you or your caregiver will be listed here. Still needs $n steps to reach the goal. You have completed your steps goal.
Caregiver Notification Setting
Please wait while we load Notifications for you CAREGIVER NOTIFICATION Medication Setting By selecting this,caregiver will be notified when patient confirms medicine intake. By selecting this,caregiver will be notified if patient misses medicine intake. Caregiver Notification Setting Measurement Setting By selecting this,caregiver will be notified when patient completes measurement. By selecting this,caregiver will be notified if patient misses measurement.
Set Measurement Parameters SET MEASUREMENT PARAMETERS
Notification Time Setting Caregiver will be notified if patient misses therapies and/or parameters are breached. Send notification every (x) mins Note: This notification will stop after patient resumes meds and/or caregiver acknowledges notification
